Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.server
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.commands

  • Class
    Description
    CommandManager
    This class implements a task that, until termination, takes match-related commands from the CommandManager.match command queue and executes them on the related Game instance.
    CommandStrategy
    This interface represents a strategy to be used for managing a game UserCommand on a Match.
    CommandUtilities
    This class contains some utility methods for common operations among the CommandStrategy implementations.
    ControllerTestUtils
    A class that contains some util methods to generate JsonObject commands, used in other test classes, such as MatchRegistryTest or CommandManagerTest.
    DisconnectCallback
    This class represents the callback function to be called after a Dispatcher connected to a Match disconnects.
    InMatchCallback
    This class represents a BiConsumer<JsonObject, Dispatcher> to be set to a Dispatcher (through Dispatcher.setOnReceive(Consumer)) when the Dispatcher is connected to a Match.
    Match
    This class represents a single match operated by the server.
    MatchRegistry
    This class keeps track of all the matches that are currently active.
    Messages
    Static class containing utilities for working with JsonObject messages
    Pinger
    This class represents a TimerTask that sends "PING" messages to all the Dispatchers that are connected to a certain Match.
    RejoiningCommandStrategy
    This class represents the concrete CommandStrategy to use for the managing of a UserCommand if the match is in rejoining state (i.e.
    StandardCommandStrategy
    This class represents the standard concrete CommandStrategy to use for the managing of a UserCommand (if the match is not in a rejoining state).
